full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SKYABS 'GRO'I KHRID YIG THUB BSTAN SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020A *, ,(CES SKYABS 'GRO'I KHRID YIG THUB BSTAN SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB BU LUNG RIGS SMRA BA AU TZU MU CHEN DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG YAR 'PHEL GYIS YANG YANG NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, RIGS BRGYA'I KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG 'JAM DBYANGS BSHAD PA PAndI TA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO'I SDE YAB SRAS RNAMS KYI BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL BA, PAN CHUNG RIGS SMRA ^ DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DGE LDAN BSTAN PA 'PHEL RGYAS GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG 'JIGS MED GRAGS PAS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO KUN BSTAN PA'I SGOR 'JUG PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,AOm SVA STI, THUB BSTAN 'DZIN MAR SKAL BZANG ZHING BA'I TSOGS, ,PHAN BDE'I LO TOG LONGS SU SPYOD PA'I PHYIR, ,BKRA SHIS GA-YAS SU 'KHYIL BA'I CHOS GRVA LAS, ,CHOS SBYIN BDUD RTZI'I GRU CHAR 'DI PHAB PO,, ,,)
